text: Mai may refer to: *Mai (name) *Mai, a minor character from the television show Avatar: The Last Airbender *Laskovyi Mai - Soviet boy band from Moscow *Chiang Mai - city in Thailand *The translation of the month May in several European and other languages ==Movies or TV series== *Mai (2013 movie), a Bollywood movie featuring Asha Bhosle *Mai (TV series), a 2022 Netflix India Original series
title: Mai
